caption:
“Bel canto is supposed to be the quintessential way to sing opera. The style is associated with beautiful melodies, silvery voices and floods of rapid notes curling their way up and down the scale, sometimes only loosely around the framework of what the composer actually wrote.”
Dandini In Rossini’s La Cenerentola at State Opera Sofia @operasofia .
#opera #operasingersoninstagram #lovemyjob #sofia #bulgaria #stage #rossini #lacenerentola

I am deeply touched by the gratitude and hospitality of New York audience!
Bravo maestro Pavel Nersessian !
Thanks SFMRNY and Raisa Bahchieva in person for organising this event!

It was a remarkable moment!
Bravi tutti!
@operasofia I will miss you!
